Times Co. sells About.com for $300M

Barry Diller’s IAC purchased About.com from the newspaper, letting the company expand its Ask.com informational website business. (Bloomberg)

101 arrested at country music festival

Foxborough police arrested 101 people and took another 466 into custody during a weekend country music festival at Gillette Stadium, police said. (Globe)
